entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
